entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
